pattern.title: Standard opening phrase for picture property data definition

rule.context: *[(self::xs:element or self::xs:attribute) and ends-with(@name, 'Picture') and not(xs:boolean(@abstract) eq true())] /xs:annotation/xs:documentation[1]
rule.report: Rule 7-52: The data definition for a property with a picture representation term SHOULD begin with the standard opening phrase "An (optional adjectives) (image|picture|photograph)".
